title: (x) Bart - Bamboo knock-off {John}
content: There was a font called 'Bard' that, if I recall correctly, was bundled with CorelDraw. It's the same design I think. No idea as to which one is the original, though.
author: antiuser

comments.content: It started off as an ATF font called Bamboo.

Image Club released the ATF version of Bamboo back in 1989. It was discontinued around 1998. You can still find copies of it on older Image Club LetterPress CDs. Sometimes these discs pop up on eBay, and I have some �lighty-used� LetterPress discs in my archive. If you're interested, contact me off-thread.
